ns0:entry.ns0:title: Azure/AzureLocal-Supportability
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Azure/AzureLocal-Supportability
Language: powershell
Welcome to the Azure Local Supportability Forum! This is where the Azure Local team will track troubleshooting guides and issues with Azure Local. We will maintain this repo in order to provide a central location for community driven supportability content.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: Cloud-Architekt/AzureAD-Attack-Defense
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Cloud-Architekt/AzureAD-Attack-Defense
Language: powershell
This publication is a collection of various common attack scenarios on Microsoft Entra ID (formerly known as Azure Active Directory) and how they can be mitigated or detected.
